org.apache.pig.data

Class LimitedSortedDataBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.data.LimitedSortedDataBag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable, Iterable<Tuple>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable, DataBag, Spillable

    public class LimitedSortedDataBag
extends Object
implements DataBag
    An ordered collection of Tuples (possibly) with multiples. Data is stored in a priority queue as it comes in, and only sorted when iterator is requested. LimitedSortedDataBag is not spillable. We allow a user defined comparator, but provide a default comparator in cases where the user doesn't specify one.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
